name: Navy Royale
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Navy Royale is a fast-paced, strategy based top-down shooter where you play as a Royal Navy Captain on a mission to take down as many pirates as you can with your very limited ammo and single life.

You'll have to move and think fast in order to defeat the large amounts of enemies in each of the 20 levels.

CONTROLS:

WAD for movement (up, left, right).

Left and right arrow keys to shoot.

Up arrow key to pick up ammo.

"R" key to restart a level.

Space bar and Esc to interact with the dialogue.

THEME:

In each level, you have only a very limited amount of bullets, in contrast to the pirates you're fighting, who have unlimited amounts. And yet, it is up to you to outsmart them and defeat them somehow. Less is more.

It also fits into the plot of the game. However, I'd rather not talk about it on here.

CREDITS:

Game by Wenderly Games.

Music by Anthony Sabatino.
